Cash and Equivalents: cash and cash equivalents at carrying value
Prepaid and Other Current Assets: prepaid expense and other assets current
Receivables: accounts and financing receivable allowance for credit loss current
accounts and financing receivable before allowance for credit loss current
accounts notes and loans receivable net current
allowance for doubtful accounts receivable current

Long-term Investments: investments in affiliates subsidiaries associates and joint ventures
Other Non-Current Assets: operating lease right of use asset
Property, Plant, and Equipment (net): accumulated depreciation depletion and amortization property plant and equipment

Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income: accumulated other comprehensive income loss net of tax
Total Equity: stockholders equity including portion attributable to noncontrolling interest

Accounts Payable and Accrued Expenses: accounts payable and accrued liabilities current

Long-term Debt: long term debt and capital lease obligations
Other Non-Current Liabilities: pension and other postretirement defined benefit plans liabilities noncurrent

__unmapped__: assets of disposal group including discontinued operation current
deferred compensation employee stock ownership plans and other
disposal group including discontinued operation assets noncurrent
liabilities of disposal group including discontinued operation current
liabilities of disposal group including discontinued operation noncurrent
